title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 - Mar 25 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 - Mar 25 2022
description:
Kenny Xu, president of the advocacy group Color Us United and author of “An Inconvenient Minority" joins C&B to talk about the Asian-American pushback against the woke left. Mayor Adams sued for NYC's vax mandate double standard. Three biggest migration losers: LA, NY, Chicago. On the 50th anniversary of the Godfather, C&B talk great movies and more. C&B close out the week with some callers. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
